trans-unit.source: Provides a type converter to convert object references to and from other representations.
trans-unit.target: 提供類型轉換器，將物件參考，與其他表示相互轉換。

trans-unit.source: The ReferenceConverter is typically used within the context of sited components or a design environment.
trans-unit.target: ReferenceConverter 通常是在站台的元件或設計環境的內容。

trans-unit.source: Without a component site or a usable <xref:System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext>, this converter is of little use.
trans-unit.target: 不含元件的站台或使用<xref:System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext>，這個轉換子就是不太有用。</xref:System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext>

trans-unit.source: This converter converts a reference of an object that implements the <xref:System.ComponentModel.IComponent> interface and displays its properties in the **Properties** window.
trans-unit.target: 這個轉換器轉換的實作的物件參考<xref:System.ComponentModel.IComponent>介面，並顯示其屬性**屬性**視窗。</xref:System.ComponentModel.IComponent>

trans-unit.source: For more information about type converters, see the <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter> base class and [How to: Implement a Type Converter](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需型別轉換子的詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter>基底類別和[How to︰ 實作類型轉換器](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。</xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > You should never create an instance of the ReferenceConverter class.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 您絕對不要建立 ReferenceConverter 類別的執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Instead, call the <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor.GetConverter%2A> method of the <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor> class.
trans-unit.target: 請改為呼叫<xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor.GetConverter%2A>方法的<xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor>類別。</xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor> </xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor.GetConverter%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the examples in the <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter> base class.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter>基底類別</xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter>中的範例

trans-unit.source: This class provides the <xref:System.ComponentModel.ReferenceConverter.IsValueAllowed%2A> method to check whether a particular value can be added to the standard values collection.
trans-unit.target: 這個類別會提供<xref:System.ComponentModel.ReferenceConverter.IsValueAllowed%2A>方法來檢查特定的值是否可以加入標準值集合。</xref:System.ComponentModel.ReferenceConverter.IsValueAllowed%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you do not want to add the value to the collection, override this method.
trans-unit.target: 如果您不想要新增至集合的值，覆寫這個方法。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ReferenceConverter"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.ComponentModel.ReferenceConverter"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Type> that represents the type to associate with this reference converter.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Type>表示與這個參考轉換子的型別。</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether this converter can convert an object in the given source type to a reference object using the specified context.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出這個轉換器是否可以轉換給定的來源類型中的物件參考的物件使用指定的內容。

trans-unit.source: The `context` parameter can be used to extract additional information about the environment this converter is being invoked from.
trans-unit.target: `context`參數可以用來擷取這個轉換子就從叫用的環境的其他資訊。

trans-unit.source: This can be `null`, so always check.
trans-unit.target: 這可以是`null`，所以一定要檢查。

trans-unit.source: Also, properties on the context object can return `null`.
trans-unit.target: 此外，物件上的屬性可能會傳回`null`。

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"></xref> that provides a format context.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"> </xref> ，提供格式內容。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Type> that represents the type you wish to convert from.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Type>代表您想要轉換的類型。</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if this object can perform the conversion; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果這個物件可以執行轉換，否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Converts the given object to the reference type.
trans-unit.target: 將指定的物件轉換為參考型別。

trans-unit.source: The `context` parameter can be used to extract additional information about the environment this converter is being invoked from.
trans-unit.target: `context`參數可以用來擷取這個轉換子就從叫用的環境的其他資訊。

trans-unit.source: This can be `null`, so always check.
trans-unit.target: 這可以是`null`，所以一定要檢查。

trans-unit.source: Also, properties on the context object can return `null`.
trans-unit.target: 此外，物件上的屬性可能會傳回`null`。

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"></xref> that provides a format context.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"> </xref> ，提供格式內容。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> that specifies the culture used to represent the font.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>，指定用來表示字型的文化特性。</xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Object> to convert.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object>轉換。</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: An that represents the converted value.
trans-unit.target: 表示的轉換後 value 。

trans-unit.source: The conversion cannot be performed.
trans-unit.target: 無法執行轉換。

trans-unit.source: Converts the given value object to the reference type using the specified context and arguments.
trans-unit.target: 將指定的值物件轉換為使用指定的內容和引數的參考型別。

trans-unit.source: This method most commonly converts types to and from string objects.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法最常將型別轉換和字串物件。

trans-unit.source: The `context` parameter can be used to extract additional information about the environment this converter is being invoked from.
trans-unit.target: `context`參數可以用來擷取這個轉換子就從叫用的環境的其他資訊。

trans-unit.source: This can be `null`, so always check.
trans-unit.target: 這可以是`null`，所以一定要檢查。

trans-unit.source: Also, properties on the context object can return `null`.
trans-unit.target: 此外，物件上的屬性可能會傳回`null`。

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"></xref> that provides a format context.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"> </xref> ，提供格式內容。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> that specifies the culture used to represent the font.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>，指定用來表示字型的文化特性。</xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Object> to convert.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object>轉換。</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: The type to convert the object to.
trans-unit.target: 要轉換的物件類型。

trans-unit.source: The converted object.
trans-unit.target: 轉換的物件。

trans-unit.source: destinationType is .
trans-unit.target: destinationTypeis .

trans-unit.source: The conversion cannot be performed.
trans-unit.target: 無法執行轉換。

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of standard values for the reference data type.
trans-unit.target: 取得參考資料類型的標準值集合。

trans-unit.source: The `context` parameter can be used to extract additional information about the environment this converter is being invoked from.
trans-unit.target: `context`參數可以用來擷取這個轉換子就從叫用的環境的其他資訊。

trans-unit.source: This can be `null`, so always check.
trans-unit.target: 這可以是`null`，所以一定要檢查。

trans-unit.source: Also, properties on the context object can return `null`.
trans-unit.target: 此外，物件上的屬性可能會傳回`null`。

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"></xref> that provides a format context.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"> </xref> ，提供格式內容。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.StandardValuesCollection> that holds a standard set of valid values, or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if the data type does not support a standard set of values.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.StandardValuesCollection>保存一組標準的有效值，或<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>如果資料類型不支援的標準值集合。</xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.StandardValuesCollection>

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the list of standard values returned from <xref:System.ComponentModel.ReferenceConverter.GetStandardValues*> is an exclusive list.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出是否從傳回的標準值清單<xref:System.ComponentModel.ReferenceConverter.GetStandardValues*>是獨占清單。</xref:System.ComponentModel.ReferenceConverter.GetStandardValues*>

trans-unit.source: The `context` parameter can be used to extract additional information about the environment this converter is being invoked from.
trans-unit.target: `context`參數可以用來擷取這個轉換子就從叫用的環境的其他資訊。

trans-unit.source: This can be `null`, so always check.
trans-unit.target: 這可以是`null`，所以一定要檢查。

trans-unit.source: Also, properties on the context object can return `null`.
trans-unit.target: 此外，物件上的屬性可能會傳回`null`。

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"></xref> that provides a format context.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"> </xref> ，提供格式內容。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> because the <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.StandardValuesCollection> returned from <xref:System.ComponentModel.ReferenceConverter.GetStandardValues*> is an exhaustive list of possible values.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>因為<xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.StandardValuesCollection>從傳回<xref:System.ComponentModel.ReferenceConverter.GetStandardValues*>是可能值的獨占清單。</xref:System.ComponentModel.ReferenceConverter.GetStandardValues*> </xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.StandardValuesCollection>

trans-unit.source: This method never returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法不會傳回<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether this object supports a standard set of values that can be picked from a list.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出這個物件是否支援一組標準可從清單中挑選的值。

trans-unit.source: The `context` parameter can be used to extract additional information about the environment this converter is being invoked from.
trans-unit.target: `context`參數可以用來擷取這個轉換子就從叫用的環境的其他資訊。

trans-unit.source: This can be `null`, so always check.
trans-unit.target: 這可以是`null`，所以一定要檢查。

trans-unit.source: Also, properties on the context object can return `null`.
trans-unit.target: 此外，物件上的屬性可能會傳回`null`。

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"></xref> that provides a format context.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"> </xref> ，提供格式內容。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> because <xref:System.ComponentModel.ReferenceConverter.GetStandardValues*> can be called to find a common set of values the object supports.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>因為<xref:System.ComponentModel.ReferenceConverter.GetStandardValues*>可以呼叫以尋找一組常用的物件支援的值。</xref:System.ComponentModel.ReferenceConverter.GetStandardValues*>

trans-unit.source: This method never returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法不會傳回<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Returns a value indicating whether a particular value can be added to the standard values collection.
trans-unit.target: 傳回值，指出特定的值是否可以加入標準值集合。

trans-unit.source: This method is called for each value that matches the type associated with this <xref:System.ComponentModel.ReferenceConverter> and for each component found that is of the associated type.
trans-unit.target: 每個值都符合與此相關聯的類型，會呼叫這個方法<xref:System.ComponentModel.ReferenceConverter>，在每個元件發現的相關聯的類型。</xref:System.ComponentModel.ReferenceConverter>

trans-unit.source: By default, this method returns `true`, that is, it allows adding the value into the standard values collection.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設，這個方法會傳回`true`，也就是允許的值加入至標準值集合。

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"></xref> that provides an additional context.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"> </xref>提供額外的內容。

trans-unit.source: The value to check.
trans-unit.target: 要檢查的值。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the value is allowed and can be added to the standard values collection; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> if the value cannot be added to the standard values collection.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果允許的值，且可以加入至標準值集合。<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>如果無法將值新增至標準值集合。
